Subject: Meeting with President Fox.
Met with King Juan Carlos I and President Aznar.
State visit.
Met with Prime Minister Drnovsek and Russian President Putin.
Met with Prime Minister Blain and Queen Elizabeth II.
Met with Prime Minister Koizumi and Emperor Akihito. Addressed the Diet.

Met with President Kin Dae-Jung, visited the Demilitarized Zone, addressed 
U.S. military personnel.
Met with President Jiang and Premier Zhu.

Attended the International Conference on Financing for Development and met 
with President Fox.

Met with the Presidents of Peru, Colombia, and Bolivia, and with the Vice 
President of Ecuador.
Attended a summit meeting with Central American heads of state.
Met with Chancellor Schroeder and addressed the Bundestag.
Summit meeting with President Putin. Signed strategic arms reduction treaty.
Met with President Chirac and delivered a Memorial Day address in Normandy.
Audience with Pope John Paul II.
Met with President Putin.
Met with the Presidents of the Baltic States.
Met with President Iliescu.

Discussed the Iraq crisis with British Prime Minister Blair, Spanish 
President Aznar, and Portuguese Prime Minister Durao.

Met with Prime Minister Blair to discuss the reconstruction of Iraq. Also 
met with Irish Prime Minister Ahern and Northern Irish political leaders.

Met with President Kwasniewski and Prime Minister Miller; visited former 
Nazi concentration camps.

Met with President Putin and attended ceremonies commemorating the city’s 
300th anniversary.

Attended “Red Sea Summit” with the leaders of Bahrain, Egypt, Jordan, and 
Saudi Arabia, and with Palestinian Prime Minister Abbas.

Attended meetings with Israeli Prime Minister Sharon and Palestinian Prime 
Minister Abbas. Met with King Abdullah II.

Met with Emir Hamad Thani, visited U.S. Central Command headquarters and 
addressed U.S. military personnel. Overflew Baghdad en route to Qatar.
Met with President Wade.
Met with President Mbeki.
Met with President Mogae. Toured Mokoldi Nature Reserve.
Met with President Musaveni.
Met with President Obasanjo.
Met with Prime Minister Koizumi.

Addressed a joint session of the Philippine Congress and met with President

Met with Prime Minister Goh Chok Tong.
Met with President Sukarnoputri and Muslim religious leaders.
Met with Prime Minister Howard and addressed Parliament.
Met with Prime Minister Harper.

Met with President Gul and Prime Minister Erdogan; addressed the Grand

Met with President Calderon.
Met with King Abdullah.
Met with President Mubarak and delivered and address at Cairo University.

Met with Chancellor Merkel, visited the Buchenwald concentration camp and 
visited wounded U.S. military personnel.

Met with President Sarkozy and dedicated the new visitor center at the U.S. 
Military Cemetery in Normandy.
Met with President Medvedev and Prime Minister Putin.
Audience with Pope Benedict XVI.
Met with President Mills and addressed Parliament.
Attended the North American Leaders’ Summit.

Addressed a session of the International Olympic Committee and met with 
Prime Minister Rasmussen.
Met with Emperor Akihito and Prime Minister Hatoyama.

Met with President Hu, National People’s Congress Chairman Wu, and Premier

Met with President Lee.
Met with King Harald V and Queen Sonja. Received the Nobel Peace Prize.

Signed Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty with Russia. Also met with the 
Presidents of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Latvia, and Romania; and with 
the Prime Ministers of Bulgaria, Croatia, the Czech Republic, Hungary, 
Lithuania, Poland, Slovakia, and Slovenia.

Met with President Yudhoyono.
Met with President Roussef.
Met with President Pinera.
Met with President Funes.

Met with President McAleese and Prime Minister Kenny. Visited ancestral

Met with Queen Elizabeth II, Prime Minister Cameron, and Labour Party 
leader Miliband.
Met with President Komorowski and Prime Minister Tusk.

Met with King Salman bin Abdel Aziz Al-Saud. Signed military sales

Met with President Reuven Rivlin and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. 
Visited the Western Wall and Yad Vashem.
Met with President Mahmoud Abbas.
Met with Prime Minister Paolo Gentiloni.
Met with Pope Francis and Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin.

Met with President Andrzej Duda, delivered a public address, and addressed

Official visit. Met with President Emmanuel Macron. Commemorated Bastille

Met with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and Emperor Akihito.

Met with President Moon Jae-In. Visited U.S. Military personnel at 
Garrisons Humphreys and Yongsan.
Met with President Xi Jinping. State Dinner.

Participated in the summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong-un and 
bilateral events with Singaporean Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
Met with Queen Elizabeth II and Prime Minister Theresa May.
Bilateral meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

Commemorated the 100th anniversary of the end of the WWI and met with 
French President Emmanuel Macron.

Attended a summit meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong-un. Also met 
with President Nguyễn Phú Trọng and Prime Minister Nguyễn Xuân Phúc. Trump 
made a refueling stop at an airbase in Qatar on the trip to Vietnam.
State Visit. Met with Emperor Naruhito and Prime Minister Shinzō Abe.

State Visit.[34] Met with Queen Elizabeth II and Prime Minister Theresa May. 
Laid a wreath on the Tomb of the Unknown Warrior in Westminster Abbey. 
Attended the 75th anniversary of D-Day commemorative ceremonies.

Met with Taoiseach Leo Varadkar. Spent one night at his International golf 
resort in Doonbeg.

Met with President Emmanuel Macron. Attended the 75th anniversary of D-Day 
memorial ceremonies. Visited the Normandy American Cemetery and Memorial.
Spent one night at his International golf resort in Doonbeg.

Met with President Moon Jae-in. Visited the Korean Demilitarized Zone. 
Attended the Koreas–United States DMZ Summit with President Moon and North 
Korean leader Kim Jong-un at the Inter-Korean Freedom House on the southern 
side of the Joint Security Area of the Korean Demilitarized Zone. Visited 
U.S. troops at Osan Air Base.

Briefly walked into the northern side of the Joint Security Area of the 
Korean Demilitarized Zone, accompanied by North Korean leader Kim Jong-un, 
becoming the first sitting U.S. president to enter North Korea.
